P

plusGrdeSomme - Class in Unnamed Package
A class representing various algorithms to find the maximum sum subarray.
plusGrdeSomme() - Constructor for class plusGrdeSomme
 
plusGrdeSomme1(int[]) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Method which must find the largest sequence in a given table, if two sequences make the same sum we keep the one which is the smallest
plusGrdeSomme2(int[]) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Finds the subarray with the largest sum in the given array
plusGrdeSomme3(int[]) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Finds the maximum sum subarray using the divide-and-conquer approach.
plusGrdeSomme4(int[]) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Finds the maximum sum subarray using the optimized Kadane's algorithm.

Entry point of the code

S

sumMaxArray(int[], int, int) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Finds the maximum sum subarray within a specified range using the divide-and-conquer approach.
sumMaxTrans(int[], int, int, int) - Method in class plusGrdeSomme
Finds the maximum sum subarray that crosses the midpoint of the array.
